p: According to the qRT-PCR results, Figure 8 shows the maximum up-regulated expression level of CYP4Q4 cytochrome gene as 4.76 at 10 ppm malathion after 2 h changes in mRNA in S. oryzae adult treated with (6 mg/cm 2) for 2 h, followed by 3.75 fold change in adult insect treated with (6 mg/cm 2) of L. angustifolia EOs, and the minimum expression level reached 1.73 fold in adult insect treated with (6 mg/cm 2) of N. sativa EOs for 1 h as compared with reference gene (housekeeping gene, Î²-Actin).
